name: apish-fork
description: Mock APIs and Services from API Blueprint or Swagger

scripts.coverage: babel-node node_modules/isparta/bin/isparta cover node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- -R spec --timeout 10000
scripts.coveralls: npm run coverage && coveralls < coverage/lcov.info && codeclimate-test-reporter < coverage/lcov.info && rimraf coverage
scripts.semantic-release: semantic-release pre && npm publish && semantic-release post
